title: DT Swiss Reborn Faster, take an inside look at aero wheel development, Win ARC wheels!
content:
DT Swiss Reborn Faster goes behind the curtain for a peek inside the development of the new ARC aero road wheels. Last summer DT overhauled their aerodynamic lineup with two second gen ARC aero road carbon wheelsets. The ARC AERO+ aerodynamic approach balances speed, stability, and everyday rideability. Now, a behind-the-scenes documentary tells more of […]

The post DT Swiss Reborn Faster, take an inside look at aero wheel development, Win ARC wheels! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
